Coming Soon

22 Apr 1999

Yes, evolt.org, the web site is live. We are hoping to replace this GUI shortly, with a cleaner looking shell. If you like this one and don't want it changed send comments to info@evolt.org. Or conversely, if you know want you want to see in a design, drop us a line too!

Looking forward to hearing from you all.
